trans-unit.source: File, Directory and Disk functions Reference

seg-source.mrk: File, Directory and Disk functions Reference

target.mrk: File, Directory and Disk functions Reference

trans-unit.source: Below is a complete list of the functions available in AutoIt. Click on a function name for a detailed description.

seg-source.mrk: Below is a complete list of the functions available in AutoIt.
Click on a function name for a detailed description.

target.mrk: Below is a complete list of the functions available in AutoIt.
Click on a function name for a detailed description.

trans-unit.source: Read from the STDIN stream of the AutoIt script process.

trans-unit.source: Writes data to the STDOUT stream. Some text editors can read this stream as can other programs which may be expecting data on this stream.
